body:
Add command to copy an environment file to override a config scope (user, site, system)

### Rationale

WSC codes want to be very sure that the packages and compilers used are the ones described by the project. Several projects current patch spack through uberenv to limit extra scopes creeping in.  This would remove that hack.

### Description

git clone spack
cd spack/repo
bin/spack env activate --without-view --scope=user <path/to/environment/file>

Then all further commands in the spack repository would honor only that environment file.  This would require piggy back on the on going work of moving the user config out of the users home directory.
title: Option to copy configs to any hard config scope
